name: WP CUSTOM USER REGISTRATION
author: Yarddiant

sections.description:
WP CUSTOM USER REGISTRATION provides you extra fields to wordpress default registration.

Types of fields

  • First Name
  • Last Name
  • Email ID

    • Support & Customisation

    Developers & contributors of this plugin are
    from a wordpress development company gives a best support and best customisation to add more fields as per the requirement.
    Since extra fields is for the default registration form is a requirement in woocommerce integration, this plugin is the best plugin which can give a best solution apart from all other woocommerce development company.
    In future this custom wp registration plugin will give more updates which gives option to add your own fields.
